tweets.text:
I'm in a debate w a friend about whether it's possible to build a software company selling to cell carriers only. Each country has two to four of them, and there's only about 100 that matter globally. 

I generally stay away from markets with fewer than 500 accounts in the TAM.

Great to see two (!) @stagevp companies — @firstresonance and @RetrocausalAI — on the Advanced Manufacturing 50 list of most promising startups from @CBinsights. 

 https://t.co/ixYJyRfR3k

For years I’ve believed that the most useful application of crypto was the creation of a sandbox for speculation without the potential for contagion to the rest of the financial system. 

Guess I was wrong about that one, guys.
Manet painting of a Tesla coil https://t.co/wL3kcsLVly
"Software is the only deflationary force that exists in the world today." — Bill McDermott, $NOW Q1 '22 earnings call
Charlie Munger once again talking about gerrymandered districts in California, which hasn’t been true for nearly two decades.
RT @HREVconference: Learn how Prudential Financial and Linde have revolutionized their approach to managing benefits using Abett’s employer…
